items.summary: Add the following exact introductory/reminder copy to the experience UI so users see it before or at the start of the journey: "You are going on trip in RV. You dont see everything that's happening. Remember your choices!". Implement this in the Start Journey screen (frontend/src/components/rv/StartJourneyScreen.tsx) as additional visible text near the existing introduction content, without changing the sentence text, punctuation, or spelling.
